about_the_game:
What kind of game is it?

XingHaiDeLiuYan is a more traditional bullet-screen shooting game that features randomly configured enemy ships and bullet-screens, but also has a more focused game content that strengthens the player. Players can acquire and strengthen three types of aircraft and more than a dozen weapons during the game, plus the skillful operation of weapons and aircraft, and gradually challenge more and more powerful enemies.

How complete is the game?

The current version is an official version with the full game content, and there will be no updates except for bugs and bug fixes that are unlikely to be completely avoided.(Once again, it turns out that a little bit bigger will immediately turn over.) Gameplay and balance are mostly no longer updated, while bug fixes, graphical tweaks, and a few functional updates will be released gradually in the future.

How long is the game?

For those who have tried bullet screen shooting games and have some experience, the time to pass all the levels of this game is expected to be 4-5 hours, and to experience all the content of the game will take 10-20 hours.

How difficult is the game?

For those who are proficient in bullet screen shooting games, this game may seem easy, but for those who have never played bullet screen shooting games, it can be difficult. However, because the game itself focuses on the strengthening of the player's strength, as the game progresses, the player's strength will be enhanced to the extent that it is easy to cope with most difficulties.

What are the features of the game?

XingHaiDeLiuYan itself is a look-down bullet screen shooting game. In the game, the player will face a variety of different sizes and styles of enemy ships, most of the enemy ships randomly have multiple ability to fire different barrage, the player can try to destroy the enemy turret first to weaken its firepower, or directly destroy the enemy ship itself.

There are several different types of levels, each with a different goal, such as destroying a certain number of enemy ships, holding on for a certain amount of time, or destroying an enemy leader.

In order to cope with the gradually stronger enemy ships, players can obtain a total of three aircraft and 18 weapons in the game, most weapons can be configured on any aircraft (a few weapons have certain assembly restrictions). At the same time, the aircraft itself has a variety of modules to choose from that will have a significant impact on performance, and the weapon will also receive three different tuning components after strengthening. A variety of combinations can help players overcome increasingly difficult challenges.

There are also several types of resources in the game, which have different ways of obtaining them. It starts with easy access to primary resources and works its way up to the advanced resources needed to strengthen aircraft and weapons, eventually transforming them into more powerful capabilities.

Once the player has all the planes and weapons they need, there is only one objective left:

- Use your carefully chosen configuration to destroy all the enemies that stand in your way!

(All content is translated from translation software.)

(Why? Because my English is very, very poor.)
